Featured-image: CK17-coral-long-v-neck-evening-dress-with-slit_p.jpg

Description: Sleeveless V-neck is embellished with shinning rhinestones patterned across the waistline and into the bust of the bodice. The same beading and rhinestones adorn the back of the bodice that also features a sheer top. The form fitting gown is completed with a high split in the front.
